thread.title: Apple Ordered to Pay $234 Million in Patent Lawsuit
thread.title_full: Apple Ordered to Pay $234 Million in Patent Lawsuit - WSJ

author: Jack Nicas
title: Apple Ordered to Pay $234 Million in Patent Lawsuit
text:
A federal jury ordered Apple Inc. to pay the University of Wisconsin $234 million for illegally using some of the university’s technology in processors that power some iPhones and iPads, ending one of two lawsuits the university is pursuing against the technology firm.
Earlier this week, the jury in U.S. District Court in Madison, Wis., ruled that the university’s 1998 patent on improving processor efficiency was valid and that Apple...
